About the Team

The ICP  team is responsible for making sure that our millions of customers can securely login to our applications anywhere in the world, and also helping all our products communicate securely and with confidence with our users. At its core, this is a unique team that interfaces directly with end user and at the same time serves other product teams, thus providing opportunity to do both iterative product building with end users as well as well documented API first products.
You’ll learn to understand how engineering, fraud and security teams, among others, work together to solve issues. Since most of your API customers would be in-house, this position also provides an opportunity to influence our product groups on new technologies and practices you believe in.

Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description:
About the role

Gojek is looking for an experienced technologist with a passion & understanding of technology to lead our Identity and Communications Platform. This group is responsible for building and scaling our user authentication systems  along with providing our consumer facing products with a platform that helps communicating with their users through SMS, push notifications, email and many more. Your systems will be responsible for ensuring seamless registration and login, very high uptime and delivery guarantees on messages sent to users. This team supports all of our operations in Indonesia, Singapore, Vietnam, and Thailand. 

As Head of Engineering of ICP, you will partner with the ICP Group Product Manager and SVP of Gojek Platforms and other business stakeholders in the company to formulate a business strategy for our identity systems, and with Consumer Platform leadership to define communication strategies that work best for our users. You will work closely with PMs and Tech Leads across all our product groups to realize this strategy to help make Gojek a dominant identity provider in SEA markets. Strategic thinking and strong business acumen along with deep technical expertise are essential in this role. This team works as an internal SaaS provider, so prior experience building SaaS products would be a big plus. We expect you to be well-versed in current technological trends and familiar with a variety of business concepts. If you are also an excellent communicator and public speaker, we’d like to meet you.

lists.content:
• Work with ICP Group PM to formulate identity and communication strategies and international deployments
  • Work with Tech Leads of all teams within ICP to deliver technology solutions to achieve business goals
  • Oversee system design and architecture for all ICP products
  • Work on scalability and uptime of identity and communication systems
  • Work with SVP Gojek Platforms to 3discover and implement new products and technologies which yield competitive advantage
  • Work with SVP Gojek Platform to define products/processes which improves the productivity of development teams and drive adoption of these products/processes within ICP group
  • Communicate technology and business strategy to all teams in the ICP group and our stakeholders across product groups
  • As a top tier Engineering Leader, you would be expected to help the engineering organisation grow in skill and practices
  • Acquire great talent and strengthen ICP group
  • Help people grow within the company through active mentoring

• Deep knowledge of system architecture, various technology paradigms and development processes gained by a hands-on approach
  • Experience working on API based SaaS products
  • Total 12+ years of experience, with at least 5+ in a technology leadership role. Experience leading a Team of Teams would be an advantage.
  • Designing and evolving organization to suit changing business needs
  • Comfortable working with a distributed team
  • Excellent organizational and time-management skills
  • Hands on experience with complex project management
  • Strong developer empathy. You can represent multiple points of views at the same time; from the perspective of app devs, DS, operations, networking, security, etc. to various stakeholders along at the same time.
